oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Coal man dies, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A published photo of Fred B. Cassetty, from the Nashville Times (1940). Cassetty (1882-1940), a leader in the coal business, is buried in Nashville’s Mount Olivet Cemetery. The 1941 City Directory cites the Fred B. Cassetty Coal Company “coal and coke, 816 4th Avenue N.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cassetty, Fred B., 1882-1940
